concept.title: MQTT subscribers are being disconnected
concept.shortdesc: The connection that is currently being used by an MQTT client can be taken over by another MQTT client that is using the same client ID. MQTT subscriber applications can be disconnected.

section.p: If you need your MQTT subscriber application to keep its connection until it has finished processing, you can develop your application and configure endpoints, connection policies, and messaging policies to ensure that the application is not disconnected because the connection has been taken over by another client.
